document_data.name: Lair of the Unspeakable
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lair of the Unspeakable''' was a secret [[yak-man|yikarian]] location nestled deep beneath the [[Court District]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description:
The lair was actually a large artificially-made cavern located underground.

''[[Continual light]]'' spells were used to illuminate much of the cavern.
document_data.Activities: This lair was the hideout of the [[Unspeakable]], a [[yak-man]] high priest of considerable power. The Unspeakable had a group of [[dao]] servants dig out his lair in under a week.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The Unspeakable used this cavern to store the bodies of both himself and the [[Watcher]]. The bodies were cared for and guarded by other servants of the Unspeakable in addition to a pair of dao.

Three other yak-men, called the [[Harvester]], the [[Guardian]], and the [[Destroyer]], also used the cavern.
